index.title: Welcome to {{appName}} !
index.description: {{appName}} allows you to manage your breeding by keeping track of your mounts and couplings while offering a speed of research non-existent in Dofus.
index.feature1: Decide which types of mounts are in your breeding
index.feature4: Automatically pre-filled children name based on parents name when coupling
index.feature5: Number of mounts in breeding grouped by type
index.future1: Income/Expenditure to calculate efficiency of your breeding
index.future2: Some kind of trading mechanism with users of your server
index.future3: More things maybe? Who knows ðŸ˜¶
